text: Hey all - I'm a current Senior Product Designer for a top 10 bank, and am looking to dive into freelance work. I specialize in designing custom websites, web and mobile platforms, or just about anything to do with UX/UI. If anyone has some projects on the go and needs some kick-a** design, give me a shout and we can jump on a call :the_horns::the_horns:

Hi everyone!
I am a result-oriented and highly motivated Full-Stack developer with over 7 years of experience with huge brands and companies from over 20+ countries of the world. I know my business and always take a lead in work. Each solution that I suggest is based on facts, data, and my real experience. I always have interesting solutions for your project, using the latest tech trends. I'm always building strong communication between startups/companies and their customers. I'm always available to help to engage the best result forming strong relationships with you.
